content: उन्मार्ग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उत्क्रांतः मार्गात्] Going to a wrong path. --र्गः {@--1@} A wrong road, deviation from the right road (<ab>fig.</ab> also); नित्यमुन्मार्गगामिनां <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} An improper conduct, evil course, moral turpitude; उन्मार्गप्रस्थितानि इंद्रियाणि <ls>K. 155</ls>; °प्रवर्तकः <ls n="K.">103.</ls> --र्गं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Astray, by a wrong way; <ls>Pt. 1. 161.</ls>
